scenes.title: Brighton Beach Mayhem
scenes.description: A peaceful day at Brighton Beach turns into a nightmare as great white sharks with humanoid legs emerge from the sand and sea, attacking the crowd.

shots.composition: Full view of Brighton Beach with kids, sunbathers and teenagers
shots.action: Show Brighton Beach bustling with activities
shots.scriptSegment: The sun shines brightly above Brighton Beach, a tourist haven. Kids build sandcastles near the shimmering ocean waves; sunbathers lay out on the hot sand. A group of teenagers SPLASH unbidden into the water.

shots.composition: Focus on sand shifting and rippling
shots.scriptSegment: Suddenly, the SAND starts to shift and ripple in something akin to an earthquake. Onlookers SCREAM, scattering in all directions.

shots.composition: Focus on shark fin piercing through the sandy surface
shots.action: Show shark fin piercing through the sand and a great white shark emerging
shots.scriptSegment: CLOSE UP on a SHARK FIN piercing through the sandy surface. A terrifyingly evolved GREAT WHITE SHARK emerges. It has humanoid legs, muscular and agile. Its jaws SNAP, unveiling rows of serrated teeth.

shots.composition: Full view of beach with mayhem spreading
shots.action: Show sharks charging and lunging towards the crowd
shots.scriptSegment: The shark charges towards the crowd. It LUNGES, and there's a blood curdling SCREAM. More sharks thrust themselves from the sand. MAYHEM spreads.

shots.composition: Focus on teenagers in the water
shots.action: Show teenagers isolated in the water
shots.scriptSegment: The group of teenagers, isolated in the water. They see the frenzy on the beach, but they are confused and terrified. One of them points out at the ocean.

shots.action: Show an army of land sharks pouring out from the sea
shots.scriptSegment: A SURGING ARMY OF LAND SHARKS pour out from the sea, their arrival accenting the absolute horror on shore.

vfx: Ripple and earthquake effect on sand
safety: Water safety for scenes involving water

colorPalette: Bright colors for initial beach scene
